results.title: Simvastatin-Loaded Nanostructured Lipid Carriers as Topical Drug Delivery System for Wound Healing Purposes: Preparation, Characterization, and In Vivo Histopathological Studies
results.text_hl: ... In vivo effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-loaded NLCs on @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure ulcers@@@

results.title: The protective effect of statins against pressure ulcers in stroke patients: A propensity-score matched study based on a real-world database.
results.text_hl: Use of @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, atrovastatin, @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was associated with reduced poststroke @<m>DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure ulcers@@@.

citations.NLM: Huang YC, Chang CC, Yeh CC, Lin CS, Hu CJ, Chen TL, Liao CC. The protective effect of statins against pressure ulcers in stroke patients: A propensity-score matched study based on a real-world database. Atherosclerosis. 2021 Jan;317():22-28. PMID: 33333345
